items.name: Meru Discovery Den
items.short_description: An interactive museum where children can explore local culture, history, and natural science through hands-on exhibits designed for curious young minds.
items.address: Kinoru Stadium Road, Meru Town, Meru

items.name: Little Innovators Lab
items.short_description: A vibrant space fostering creativity and problem-solving through workshops in robotics, coding, and imaginative play, perfect for future engineers and artists.
items.address: Near Meru National Polytechnic, Meru-Nanyuki Highway, Meru

items.name: Cultural Kids' Corner
items.short_description: Dedicated to teaching children about Meru's rich heritage through traditional stories, crafts, and games in an engaging, family-friendly environment.
items.address: Meru Museum Grounds, Milimani Estate, Meru

items.name: Playful Past Museum
items.short_description: Step back in time! Kids can explore ancient tools, replica artifacts, and historical games, learning about the past in a fun and interactive way.

items.name: Mt. Kenya Adventure Park Jr.
items.short_description: A thrilling theme park featuring mini roller coasters, splash pads, and imaginative play zones, all inspired by the natural beauty of Mt. Kenya.

items.name: Meru Safari Kidsland
items.short_description: Embark on a mini-safari adventure with jungle-themed rides, animal encounters, and discovery trails, perfectly scaled for young explorers.

items.name: Magical Meadows Fun Park
items.short_description: A whimsical park with gentle rides, vibrant gardens, and magical play structures, ideal for toddlers and young children seeking enchantment.

items.name: Sunshine Coast Mini World
items.short_description: Despite being inland, this park offers a 'coastal' experience with water play zones, sand pits, and miniature boat rides for endless aquatic fun.

items.name: Meru Funfair Whirl
items.short_description: A collection of classic amusement rides, including a Ferris wheel, merry-go-round, and bumper cars, providing nostalgic fun for all ages.
items.address: Makutano Town Center, Meru-Nanyuki Highway, Meru

items.name: Joyride Junction
items.short_description: Features a variety of kid-friendly rides like spinning teacups, mini trains, and a giant slide, ensuring endless giggles and excitement.

items.name: Sky High Swings & Slides
items.short_description: Offers exhilarating swings that go high into the air and towering slides, perfect for older kids seeking a dose of adrenaline.
items.address: Near Meru University of Science & Technology, Meru

items.name: The Giggle Go-Rounds
items.short_description: A charming collection of smaller rides including carousels, bouncing castles, and gentle car rides, designed for the youngest visitors.

items.name: Meru Young Scientists Hub
items.short_description: An inspiring science center with hands-on experiments, interactive exhibits on physics and chemistry, and a dedicated space for budding inventors.

items.name: Stargazer's Observatory & Lab
items.short_description: Explore the cosmos! This center features a planetarium, telescope viewing sessions, and exhibits on astronomy and space exploration.

items.name: Eco-Explorers Center
items.short_description: Focuses on environmental science, conservation, and sustainable living with interactive displays on local ecosystems, climate change, and recycling.
items.address: Behind Meru ASK Showground, Meru Town, Meru

items.name: Curiosity Cavern Science Museum
items.short_description: Dive into the wonders of biology and geology with fossil digs, mineral displays, and interactive exhibits on the human body and natural phenomena.

items.name: Meru Brick Builder's City
items.short_description: An immersive park where children can build anything imaginable with millions of LEGO bricks, featuring vast building zones and impressive LEGO models of Meru landmarks.
items.address: Opposite Meru Slopes Hotel, Meru Town, Meru

items.name: Construct-It Kingdom
items.short_description: A construction-themed play park with diggers, cranes, and building blocks of all sizes, allowing kids to engage in large-scale building projects.

items.name: Mini-Master Builder's Park
items.short_description: Designed for younger children, this park offers oversized soft bricks and simpler construction challenges, encouraging early engineering skills.

items.name: Gear & Giggles Construction Zone
items.short_description: A dynamic area where kids can design and build moving machines, explore simple mechanics, and create intricate structures with various building systems.

items.name: Meru Dino Roar Valley
items.short_description: Walk among life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, dig for fossils, and explore prehistoric landscapes in this thrilling and educational park.

items.name: Prehistoric Playland
items.short_description: A fun-filled park with dinosaur-themed playgrounds, obstacle courses, and interactive exhibits that teach kids about different dinosaur species.

items.name: Jurassic Jungle Kids
items.short_description: Explore a lush jungle habitat filled with hidden dinosaur models, a maze, and a storytelling cave, bringing the Jurassic era to life for young adventurers.
items.address: Near Meru National Park Gate, Meru

items.name: Triassic Trails Adventure
items.short_description: Follow marked trails through a forest dotted with static dinosaur figures, offering a scenic and informative journey into the ancient world.

items.name: Toon Town Plaza
items.short_description: Meet and greet beloved cartoon characters, enjoy live performances, and participate in themed games and photo opportunities with your favorites.

items.name: Character Carnival Meru
items.short_description: A lively carnival where popular cartoon mascots roam, offering high-fives, autographs, and leading parades with music and dance.
items.address: Meru ASK Showground, Meru Town, Meru

items.name: Storybook Friends Fair
items.short_description: Interact with characters from classic children's storybooks, enjoy storytelling sessions, and participate in craft activities related to beloved tales.

items.name: Animated Adventures Hub
items.short_description: Step into the world of animated movies and TV shows, with character appearances, themed games, and a special screening area for favorite episodes.
items.address: Makutano Shopping Centre, Meru-Nanyuki Highway, Meru

items.name: Meru Marine Wonders
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant underwater world with diverse marine life from Kenya's coast and beyond, featuring colorful coral reefs and mesmerizing fish tanks.
items.address: Near Meru Greens Horticultural Park, Meru

items.name: River Giants & Reef Dreams
items.short_description: Showcasing both freshwater giants from local rivers and the delicate beauty of ocean reefs, this aquarium offers a dual perspective on aquatic ecosystems.

items.name: The Aqua Explorium
items.short_description: An interactive aquarium where children can touch friendly sea creatures in touch pools, learn about conservation, and watch daily feeding shows.

items.name: Lake Victoria Little Critters
items.short_description: Focusing on the aquatic biodiversity of Lake Victoria and other regional lakes, this compact aquarium highlights local fish, amphibians, and invertebrates.

items.name: Junior Champs Sports Complex
items.short_description: A multi-sport facility offering mini soccer fields, basketball courts, and a running track, designed for children aged 5-12 to play and train.
items.address: Kinoru Stadium Road, Meru Town, Meru

items.name: Meru Active Kids Arena
items.short_description: Features a climbing wall, obstacle course, and specialized areas for gymnastics and martial arts, promoting fitness and agility in a fun environment.

items.name: Goal Getters Park
items.short_description: Primarily a soccer-focused mini arena with several small pitches, training drills, and friendly match opportunities for aspiring young footballers.

items.name: Future Stars Multi-Sport Center
items.short_description: Offers diverse sports like mini-tennis, badminton, and volleyball courts, along with equipment rental, catering to a wide range of athletic interests.

items.name: Meru Wildlife Haven Jr.
items.short_description: A miniature zoo featuring smaller African animals, exotic birds, and a dedicated education center on local wildlife conservation, perfect for young learners.

items.name: Savannah Smiles Petting Zoo
items.short_description: An interactive petting zoo where children can safely feed and interact with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, rabbits, and guinea pigs.

items.name: Little Paws & Hooves Farm
items.short_description: Experience farm life with pony rides, animal feeding, and demonstrations of milking cows and shearing sheep, offering a glimpse into rural Meru life.

items.name: Jungle Jamboree Zoo for Kids
items.short_description: A kid-centric zoo featuring playful monkeys, colorful parrots, and other fascinating creatures in interactive exhibits, complete with a jungle-themed playground.
